content.text: Chorax was a planet in Rachuk sector, which lay between Commenor and Talasea. It was a haven for pirates and smugglers.
The Rebel ship Nonnah once crashed on Chorax. Subsequently, Rogue Squadron had to save the ship's crew from Imperial forces.
In 6 ABY, the Black Asp ambushed the Pulsar Skate, starting the battle in the Chorax system.
